author: Osborne,Bruce
subject: Looking For Someone
body:
I was curious, I am looking for someone to take over the Lupin III Webring
for me (currently located at http://anime-world.simplenet.com/lupin), I've
been running the ring since around last November, currently has 12 or so
sites on it. Since I'm going to be working heavy on my Anime World site and
on my Patlabor page, I don't have the time for the Lupin III Webring, but I
don't want to see it die out. If your interested please contact me at
saitoh-hajime@neo.rr.com!
--------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
ICQ: 3 1 3 7 9 2 3 7 
Email: saitoh-hajime@neo.rr.com
URL: http://anime-world.simplenet.com/
